name: minstrel-app
description: Electron + Angular discord music streaming app
author: TheMischko

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all -p start:shared-lib start:angular-app start:electron-app
scripts.start:angular-app: wait-on workspaces/shared-lib/.dist/index.d.ts && cd workspaces/angular-app && npm run start
scripts.start:electron-app:once: wait-on http://localhost:4200 && npm run start:sound-capture-app && electron-forge start
scripts.package: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run package:angular-app && npm run package:electron-app && npm run package:sound-capture-app
scripts.package:angular-app: npm run package:shared-lib && cd workspaces/angular-app && npm run package
scripts.make: npm run package:angular-app && npm run package:sound-capture-app && electron-forge make
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:angular-e2e && npm run test:electron-e2e
scripts.start:angular-e2e: wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cd workspaces/angular-app && npm run cypress:run
scripts.test:electron-e2e: npm run package && npm run test:electron-e2e:wdio-only
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf .webpack out allure-results _package-lock.json node_modules workspaces/shared-lib/.dist workspaces/angular-app/node_modules workspaces/angular-app/.angular workspaces/angular-app/.dist
scripts.postinstall: husky install && shx rm -rf .git/hooks && shx ln -s ../.husky .git/hooks
scripts.outdated-deps: npm run outdated-deps:electron-app && npm run outdated-deps:angular-app && npm run outdated-deps:shared-lib
scripts.update-deps: npm run update-deps:electron-app && npm run update-deps:angular-app && npm run update-deps:shared-lib
scripts.update-deps:electron-app: npx ncu -u && npm run clean && npm i --force
scripts.update-deps:angular-app: cd workspaces/angular-app && ng update @angular/cli @angular/core --force && npx ncu -u && cd ../.. && npm run clean && npm i --force
